channel.title: HAG on Quiet time notes
channel.description: Recent content in HAG on Quiet time notes

item.title: HAG 2
item.description: HAG 2:8 We have to be sensible user of God’s money. He owns it and blessed us with it. The raw materials are from God. We just convert it to useful product and place value on it Related verses: Haggai 2:8. See notes
